column1: "- Load the extension in Chrome/Chromium by going to chrome://extensions/
"Failed to create native messaging host configuration
"Failed to create native messaging hosts directory
"Failed to set permissions on native messaging host configuration
"Failed to set permissions on results file
"Native messaging hosts directory does not exist. Please create it first.
"Native messaging hosts directory does not exist. Trying parent directory...
"Note: You may need to restart Chrome for the changes to take effect

"Please provide your Chrome/Chromium config directory using --chrome-dir

To find your Chrome config directory:
1. Open Chrome/Chromium
2. Go to chrome://version
3. Look for 'Profile Path'
4. Use the parent directory of that path

Example:
If Profile Path is '/home/user/.config/google-chrome/Default'
Use: --chrome-dir '/home/user/.config/google-chrome'
"Scans web traffic for exposed secrets using TruffleHog
"trufflehog is not installed. Please install it first and add it to your system PATH.
